name: CyberGlide VR
description:
Simple but interesting game in which you need to get to the finish line as quickly as possible using hook and gravity. Beat the records of other players, friends. Become the best runner in the world.

Features

  • Stunning aestetic graphic
  • Easy to learn, hard to skill gameplay
  • Online score board
  • Alot of maps to play
  • Dangerous obstacles like lasers, walls and black holes
